text: Scary Movie is an American comedy movie. It is a parody of horror movies. It is directed by Keenen Ivory Wayans. It stars Anna Faris, Jon Abrahams, Shannon Elizabeth, Regina Hall, Marlon Wayans, Shawn Wayans and Carmen Electra. It was released to mixed reviews on July 7, 2000. It was followed by four sequels: Scary Movie 2, Scary Movie 3, Scary Movie 4 and Scary Movie 5. == Other websites == * Category:2000 comedy movies Category:2000 horror movies Category:2000s parody movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror movies Category:American parody movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:Buena Vista International movies Category:English-language movies Category:Halloween movies
title: Scary Movie
